ygData.subject: RE: see invis? I don't see it......
ygData.msgSnippet: anyone STILL think I m nuts for thinking we should beg for someone else at verant to sponsor bards?  I realize it s their game. but hell it s not like we
ygData.messageBody:
anyone STILL think I'm nuts for thinking we should beg for someone else at
verant to "sponsor" bards? I realize it's their game. but hell it's not
like we aren't PAYING them or that the request is really that unreasonable..
OF course it has a snowball's chance in lavastorm. But I'm fresh out of any
other hope of ever being treated like anything but a beggar.. no wait
beggars get treated better... ummm better then a small rat?

-----Original Message-----
From: sentto-160851-14553-firehawk=cloud9.net@...
[mailto:sentto-160851-14553-firehawk=cloud9.net@...]On
Behalf Of Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
Sent: Saturday, February 05, 2000 7:45 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] see invis? I don't see it......


From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>

lol i thought that was funny too. use a song that barely affects another
player on a dragon? and this guy is in control of every spell/song in the
game =/ i am really looking forward to our new songs when they come out.

Shada

> Mana drain Vox, yeah
> that's a good
> one. Where does GZ get his material.
>
> Kit
